alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:39PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL TORRANCE COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM MDT... At 439 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of McIntosh, or 10 miles southeast of Moriarty, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moriarty, Estancia, McIntosh and Clines Corners. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 196 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
